talk.author: did:plc:z6zxpiaeshcgg47slprjanmq
talk.utter: Out of curiosity, are you asking this seriously or rhetorically? God Bless.

talk.author: did:plc:yzuhzkvsmwqzujljq2ztf4kf
talk.utter: Seriously. I want to know what you base such an assumption on.

talk.author: did:plc:yzuhzkvsmwqzujljq2ztf4kf
talk.utter: Seriously. I want to know what you base such an assumption on.

talk.author: did:plc:z6zxpiaeshcgg47slprjanmq
talk.utter: It's mostly just the sense I get from talking with people that have been alone for extended periods. Watching videos of openly embittered lonely people. Hearing the rhetoric of people that advocate for being alone, usually being based in prior experiences of pain more than anything else. God Bless.

talk.author: did:plc:yzuhzkvsmwqzujljq2ztf4kf
talk.utter: “Just a sense.” Yeah, you probably shouldn’t make blanket statements based on that.
